forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the morning, then mainly cloudy late with light rain possible. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the morning, then mainly cloudy late with light rain possible. High 56F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
